biotools.summary:
A web-based platform for analyzing Small-Angle Scattering curves of lyotropic liquid crystals.

Small Angle Scattering Crystallographic Peak Treatment and Analysis.

To access SCryPTA, click here . The instructions to use SCryPTA can be found here
